price: 5. Nabad weeye (habeenkaa) ilaa waagu ka baryo1.
footnotes: 1. Rasuulkii Alle s.c.w. wuxuu yidhi: Ka doondoona layaltul Qadarka tirooyinka is dheer ee tobanka habeenood ee u dambeeya Ramadaanka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
